object.creator: 戴文生
object.name: lcIB_GS_CXXYSP
object.package: 101_固收.1_发行前.C-承销协议审批流程

column.name: LDSP
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/suggestion.sdo?LcbdID="+ID+"&Lcbd=lcib_gs_cxxysp"+"&Ywlx=120000";
"<iframe id='lc_zyldyj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"

constraint.SQL: ["lcIB_GS_LXLC.XMMC={0} AND lcIB_GS_LXLC.BJJG IN (1,2) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM JGCRM.OS_WFENTRY M WHERE M.ID= lcIB_GS_LXLC.InstID AND M.STATE = 4)",[{"expression":"XMMC","length":0,"scale":0,"type":1}]]

column.name: NMXXDJB
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/excelOut?ywlx=120000&insid='+InstID+'&lcbd=lcIB_GS_CXXYSP'; '' //'下载'

column.name: GWFJBZSM
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
请确保上传的附件与公文正文中列示的文件保持一致，该附件框中每一附件类型中仅上传一份最新版本附件至协同平台，用户可新增附件类型行'

column.name: DBXZ
column.expression: <%@ livebos language='javascript' %> var url='/gdlcDown?lcbdid='+ID+'&insid='+InstID+'&fjlx=1'+'&yhid='+$Login.User; '' //'下载'

column.name: FYYBCWJ
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> O_THIS.getColumn("FYYBCWJ").setLabel("非用印备查文件
(不上传至OA)");

column.name: OASPXX
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_GS_CXXYSP' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
var varSrc="/bss/ibb/nworkflow/page/oAsuggestion.sdo?oaWorkId="+oaid+"&lcbd=lcIB_GS_CXXYSP&lcbdId="+ID;
"<iframe id='lc_oayj' frameborder='0' width='100%' height='100%' scrolling='no' src='"+varSrc+"'></iframe>"
column.invisible-expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var oaid=ABS_SQLVALUE("select nvl(max(oaworkflowid),0) from ecif.tib_oawfhandle where lcbd='lcIB_GS_CXXYSP' and lcbdid=?",[ID])
oaid<=0

column.name: JGTS
column.expression:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %> '
客户单位是否持有“武器装备科研生产保密资格证书”、“武器装备科研生产许可证书”、“武器装备质量管理体系证书”、“装备承制单位资格证书”四证之一'
